short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform every web page into an immersive audio experience, available to you anytime.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Any Page Reader is a free software. 
It works with a variety of text-to-speech solutions and allows you to listen to web pages in speech form.
Let's organize information through a voice that suits our preferences.
